title.narrative: Countries enabled to address environmental determinants of health, including climate change

description.narrative: Health in All national strategies, policies and plans; climate change; air pollution; foodborne disease/food safety; water and sanitation; chemicals and radiation; occupational risks; enabling small island states to protect health from the impact of climate change; multilateral and bilateral climate finance for health (e.g. Green Climate Fund); communicable diseases (malaria - vector control, diagnostic testing, antimalarial treatment).

mailing-address.narrative: Monazamet El Seha El Alamia Str, Ext. of Abdel Razak El Sanhouri Street, P.O. Box 7608, Nasr City, Cairo 11371, Egypt

title.narrative: Triple billion targets - tracking the work of WHO, countries, regions and partners to meet the Triple Billion targets and health-related Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
WHO Mid-term Results Report - Programme Budget 2020-2021
